I work in a small J2EE outfit that is in the process of implementing 
JUnitEE tests.  We were recently purchased by a larger company that 
is considering purchasing JTest and I was wondering if people have 
had any experiences good or bad working with JTest in a J2EE system.  
For this comparision price is of no concern, what concerns my boss is 
functionaity, tech support from Parasoft, and the tools compliance 
with J2EE.

I personally would like to stick with JUnitEE, but I need evidence of 
why we should.

-Fazle
